name: FoodFlation
desc: A website that tracks the price history of over 13k grocery store items in 50 stores accross Canada and the US to measure inflation.

name: Email Cleaner
desc: An NPM package that cleans up email addresses by removing all the extra characters and symbols that would've been sent to the same email addresses without it.

name: Cross Spiral
desc: A visualized solution to the Cross Spiral puzzle from a former Canadian Computing Competition question.

name: ScholarScribe
desc: Made for QHacks 2023. ScholarScribe is a web application that uses AI to generate notes from uploaded lecture videos
